page.title: 19EDUCATIONAL ESTABLISHMENTS
page.content:
There are many different types of educational establishments in the Worksop area. There are primary schools scattered throughout the town, some having nursery facilities. These primary schools feed to three comprehensive schools, Hartland, Portland and Valley which have a total population of about 3500.
Post 16 education is catered for by the comprehensive school sixth forms or by the College of Further Education. Nottingham has the nearest university and both Nottingham and Sheffield have polytechnics.
Worksop college is an independent school of some note. There are several private prep-schools in the area.
